channel.title: Portofolio on Quentin Ackermann
channel.description: Recent content in Portofolio on Quentin Ackermann

item.title: Project 2 : Bank targeting campaign
item.description: Analyzed a dataset from a bank campaign to discover what elements may conduct a potential client to subscribe Preprocess the data to make them relevant and algo-friendly ! Tried out different models to find the best fit : Logistic Regression RandomForest KNN Decision Tree Bagging algorithm Optimized the models using GridSearchCV Built a tool that determine if a customer is likely to subscribe and how the bank can improve its campaign

item.title: Project 1 : Covid19 Dataset
item.description: Analyzed a Covid19 Dataset to understand the relation between the features and the target Vizualisation of the service the ill are oriented to, based on their Lymphocytes rate Preprocess the data to make them relevant and algo-friendly Tried out different models to find the best fit : RandomForest AdaBoost SVM KNN Optimized one of the models using GridSearchCV and RandomizedSearchCV
